discourse_list.title: Decrypt article covering MakerDAO, DAI, rune, endgame

content.content: New to the forum; learning inside & out… Decrypt: One Does Not Simply Destroy DAI: Maker Founder’s ‘Endgame’ Proposal.   Decrypt – 3 Sep 22    One Does Not Simply Destroy DAI: Maker Founder's 'Endgame' Proposal - Decrypt MakerDAO's founder Rune Christensen has big plans and a new direction for the future of DeFi's largest stablecoin by market cap.

Thank you very much for your interest in Maker and specifically in End Game, a complicated plan that has taken a better course at the moment since it has developed and adopted opinions from the community, a little extended to understand everything in a single summary I attach some important links to understand in more detail how everything has been developed.     Endgame Index List Governance   Endgame V3  Endgame V3 Full Post Endgame V3 Summary (LOD2)  Endgame Concept LOD Summaries What are LOD Summaries?LOD summaries are organized into sections summarizing the same information in different levels of detail.   LOD0 represents the most-simplified and abstracted version of this concept LOD1 is more complex and more accurate. LOD2 is a direct summary of Rune’s post. Runes post could be considered LOD3, with the highest level of detail and explanation.  Lower numbers = Easier to grasp …   Read this completely, I love how the community expresses itself, although sometimes they go out of context, it is very necessary to read each comment to know the feeling of the community regarding what they say in the post     The Path of Compliance and the Path of Decentralization: Why Maker has no choice but to prepare to free float Dai Governance   TL;DR: Now with some clarifications to reduce misinformation potential   Financial regulation trends towards a post-9/11 paradigm of “either you’re with us or you’re against us” with eventual zero tolerance for anything that doesn’t give full control and surveillance powers to the state The window of opportunity for DeFi to prove that it is worthy of a new middle ground of being considered a public, neutral financial utility rather than regulated as banks has now closed because DeFi failed to d…     This is synthesized     Endgame Plan timeline to free floating Dai Governance       Yeah, I know what you mean. I was thinking more about the people who maybe use DAI but don’t participate at Maker. Your point is even more relevant, for those who are or should be involved the situation is way more serious. IMO, human issues like these are a bigger challenge than financial or regulatory issues.     Maker’s feeling towards Endgame of course, this does not imply if there are Maker holders, bots, new users, etc, but it helps us understand a little about how Maker feels about Endgame, later the reason for being was further detailed by end game     [Informal Poll] End Game Governance       It is good that everyone in the forum participates in this vote, so we really know the feeling of the community, in general we can not progress in ideas without finding a balance between all of them.

Thanks for the links, these are great to get anyone new pointed in the right direction! If you read through you will see, amongst other things, that @LongForWisdom has done a great job summarizing and breaking down aspects so even someone a bit newer can get the idea.
Thank you @MFeinberg.  I will keep an eye out for the writings of @LongForWisdom in the links shared by Moisés, as I read & review this week.
Thank you very much for the info & links @Moi - I am reading & reviewing this week - I appreciate the welcoming & helpful messages from you & @MFeinberg
